purpose: To help businesses find, manage, and optimize affiliate partnerships to boost sales and marketing efforts
principle: Utilizes AI algorithms to analyze affiliate performance data and recommend strategic partnerships
reusability: Offers a REST API for integration with existing business systems, supports customizable affiliate management workflows
limitations: Currently focused on specific platforms like Vercel and Supabase, may require custom adaptation for other environments
